channel.title: the first path parameter :: Web Apps in Lisp: Know-how
channel.description:
So far we have 1 route that displays all our products. We will make each product line clickable, to open a new page, that will show more details. Each product detail will be available on the URL /product/n where n is the product ID. Add links To begin with, let’s add links to the list of products: (defparameter *template-root* " Lisp web app
    {% for product in products %}
  • {{ product.1 }} - {{ product.2 }}
    • {% endfor %}
") Carefully observe that, in the href, we had to escape the quotes :/ This is the shortcoming of defining Djula templates as strings in .lisp files. It’s best to move them to their own directory and own files.
